summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, granting an easement for the construction, operation and maintenance of a sanitary sewer line over the City of Seattle, City Light Department, Bothell-Maple Valley transmission line fee-owned right-of-way in the southeast quarter of the northwest quarter of Section 9, Township 24 North, Range 5 East, W.M., in King County, Washington (P.M. \#240509-2-301).
